mapper.sql: id, course_name, update_time, create_time, `status`, free, goal, overview, open_time, kind_id, user_id, price, watch_count, picture_url
mapper.select:
select
from ep_course where MATCH (course_name,goal,overview) AGAINST (#{keyString}) and `status`=#{status}

select
distinct
from ep_course
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into ep_course (id, course_name, update_time, create_time, status, free, goal, overview, open_time, kind_id, user_id, price, watch_count, picture_url) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{courseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{free,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{overview,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{kindId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{watchCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pictureUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update_time = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
